verses.verse: Then <WG1899> fourteen <WG1180> years <WG2094> after <WG1223> I went up <WG305> again <WG3825> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414> with <WG3326> Barnabas, <WG921> and took Titus with <WG4838> <WG5103> me also. <WG2532>

And <WG1161> I went up <WG305> by <WG2596> revelation, <WG602> and <WG2532> communicated <WG394> unto them <WG846> that gospel <WG2098> which <WG3739> I preach <WG2784> among <WG1722> the <WG3588> Gentiles, <WG1484> but <WG1161> privately <WG2596> <WG2398> to them which were of reputation, <WG1380> lest by any means <WG3381> I should run, <WG5143> or <WG2228> had run, <WG5143> in <WG1519> vain. <WG2756>
But <WG235> neither <WG3761> Titus, <WG5103> who <WG3588> was with <WG4862> me, <WG1698> being <WG5607> a Greek, <WG1672> was compelled <WG315> to be circumcised: <WG4059>

And <WG1161> that because <WG1223> of false brethren <WG5569> unawares brought in, <WG3920> who <WG3748> came in privily <WG3922> to spy out <WG2684> our <WG2257> liberty <WG1657> which <WG3739> we have <WG2192> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> that <WG2443> they might bring us into bondage: <WG2615> <WG2248>

To whom <WG3739> we gave place <WG1502> by subjection, <WG5292> no, not <WG3761> for <WG4314> an hour; <WG5610> that <WG2443> the <WG3588> truth <WG225> of the <WG3588> gospel <WG2098> might continue <WG1265> with <WG4314> you. <WG5209>

But <WG1161> of <WG575> these <WG3588> who seemed <WG1380> to be <WG1511> somewhat, <WG5100> (whatsoever <WG3697> <WG4218> they were, <WG2258> it maketh no matter <WG1308> <WG3762> to me: <WG3427> God <WG2316> accepteth <WG2983> no <WG3756> man's <WG444> person: ) <WG4383> for <WG1063> they who seemed <WG1380> to be somewhat in conference added <WG4323> nothing <WG3762> to me: <WG1698>

But <WG235> contrariwise, <WG5121> when they saw <WG1492> that <WG3754> the <WG3588> gospel <WG2098> of the <WG3588> uncircumcision <WG203> was committed <WG4100> unto me, as <WG2531> the gospel of the <WG3588> circumcision <WG4061> was unto Peter; <WG4074>

(For <WG1063> he that wrought effectually <WG1754> in Peter <WG4074> to <WG1519> the apostleship <WG651> of the <WG3588> circumcision, <WG4061> the same was mighty <WG1754> in <WG2532> me <WG1698> toward <WG1519> the <WG3588> Gentiles: ) <WG1484>

And <WG2532> when James, <WG2385> <WG2532> Cephas, <WG2786> and <WG2532> John, <WG2491> who seemed <WG1380> to be <WG1511> pillars, <WG4769> perceived <WG1097> the <WG3588> grace <WG5485> that was given <WG1325> unto me, <WG3427> they gave <WG1325> to me <WG1698> and <WG2532> Barnabas <WG921> the right hands <WG1188> of fellowship; <WG2842> that <WG2443> we <WG2249> should go unto <WG1519> the <WG3588> heathen, <WG1484> and <WG1161> they <WG846> unto <WG1519> the <WG3588> circumcision. <WG4061>
Only <WG3440> they would that <WG2443> we should remember <WG3421> the <WG3588> poor; <WG4434> the same <WG846> <WG5124> which <WG3739> I also <WG2532> was forward <WG4704> to do. <WG4160>

But <WG1161> when <WG3753> Peter <WG4074> was come <WG2064> to <WG1519> Antioch, <WG490> I withstood <WG436> him <WG846> to <WG2596> the face, <WG4383> because <WG3754> he was <WG2258> to be blamed. <WG2607>

For <WG1063> before that certain <WG5100> came <WG2064> from <WG575> James, <WG2385> he did eat <WG4906> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> Gentiles: <WG1484> but <WG1161> when <WG3753> they were come, <WG2064> he withdrew <WG5288> and <WG2532> separated <WG873> himself, <WG1438> fearing <WG5399> them <WG3588> which were of <WG1537> the circumcision. <WG4061>

And <WG2532> the <WG3588> other <WG3062> Jews <WG2453> dissembled likewise with <WG4942> <WG2532> him; <WG846> insomuch that <WG5620> Barnabas <WG921> also <WG2532> was carried away with <WG4879> their <WG846> dissimulation. <WG5272>

But <WG235> when <WG3753> I saw <WG1492> that <WG3754> they walked not uprightly <WG3716> <WG3756> according <WG4314> to the <WG3588> truth <WG225> of the <WG3588> gospel, <WG2098> I said <WG2036> unto Peter <WG4074> before <WG1715> them all, <WG3956> If <WG1487> thou, <WG4771> being <WG5225> a Jew, <WG2453> livest <WG2198> after the manner of Gentiles, <WG1483> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> as do the Jews, <WG2452> why <WG5101> compellest <WG315> thou the <WG3588> Gentiles <WG1484> to live as do the Jews? <WG2450>
We <WG2249> who are Jews <WG2453> by nature, <WG5449> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> sinners <WG268> of <WG1537> the Gentiles, <WG1484>

Knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> a man <WG444> is not <WG3756> justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law, <WG3551> but <WG3362> by <WG1223> the faith <WG4102> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> even <WG2532> we <WG2249> have believed <WG4100> in <WG1519> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> that <WG2443> we might be justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> the faith <WG4102> of Christ, <WG5547> and <WG2532> not <WG3756> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law: <WG3551> for <WG1360> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551> shall no <WG3756> flesh <WG4561> be justified. <WG1344>

But <WG1161> if, <WG1487> while we seek <WG2212> to be justified <WG1344> by <WG1722> Christ, <WG5547> we <WG846> ourselves also <WG2532> are found <WG2147> sinners, <WG268> is therefore <WG687> Christ <WG5547> the minister <WG1249> of sin? <WG266> God forbid. <WG1096> <WG3361>
For <WG1063> if <WG1487> I build <WG3618> again <WG3825> the things <WG5023> which <WG3739> I destroyed, <WG2647> I make <WG4921> myself <WG1683> a transgressor. <WG3848>
For <WG1063> I <WG1473> through <WG1223> the law <WG3551> am dead <WG599> to the law, <WG3551> that <WG2443> I might live <WG2198> unto God. <WG2316>

I am crucified with <WG4957> Christ: <WG5547> nevertheless <WG1161> I live; <WG2198> yet not <WG3765> I, <WG1473> but <WG1161> Christ <WG5547> liveth <WG2198> in <WG1722> me: <WG1698> and <WG1161> the life which <WG3739> I now <WG3568> live <WG2198> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> I live <WG2198> by <WG1722> the faith <WG4102> of <WG3588> the <WG3588> Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> who loved <WG25> me, <WG3165> and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> himself <WG1438> for <WG5228> me. <WG1700>

I do not <WG3756> frustrate <WG114> the <WG3588> grace <WG5485> of God: <WG2316> for <WG1063> if <WG1487> righteousness <WG1343> come by <WG1223> the law, <WG3551> then <WG686> Christ <WG5547> is dead <WG599> in vain. <WG1432>
